description: Eczema, particularly atopic dermatitis, is a skin condition characterized by itchiness and dryness. It can be influenced by both environmental and genetic factors.

how_to_prepare: Grind 1 cup of oats in a blender to a really fine powder.
Fill the bathtub with warm water (avoid hot water as it can aggravate the inflamed skin).
Mix the finely grinded oats with the warm water ( 1 cup of oats or more depending on the size of your bathtub) using your hand until the water is milky and feels silky.
how_to_use: Soak your body in the oatmeal bath for 10-15 minutes to relieve eczema itchiness and moisturize your skin then wash your body with lukewarm water and dry it. Apply coconut oil to areas of eczema to moisturize the skin and retain moisture.

description: Common condition characterized by smelly feet, known as bromodosis.
useful_tips: Avoid walking barefoot in public wet areas

ingredients: 1/3 cup of vinegar (white vinegar or apple cider vinegar)
how_to_prepare: Fill a foot basin with warm or cold water.
Add 1/3 cup of white vinegar or apple cider vinegar.
how_to_use: Soak your feet in the foot bath for 15 minutes (can be repeated multiple times a day if needed) then rinse and dry your feet. Rub a few drops of lavender oil on your feet especially between your toes. You can sprinkle some baking soda in your shoes to soak up the moisture and bad odor.
(Caution: avoid soaking your feet in vinegar in case of having any open wounds or sores)

causes: Sweat accumulation leading to bacterial growth
Athlete's foot and other fungal infections

description: Darkening of the skin beneath both eyes.

how_to_prepare: Add boiling water to the tea bags in a cup
Brew the tea bags for 5 – 10 minutes
Take out the tea bags and put them in the refrigerator to cool
how_to_use: Gently place the tea bags over both eyes. Let them rest for 10-15 minutes then remove the tea bags and rinse the area with water. Repeat regularly.

description: Mild puffiness or swelling beneath the eyes.

how_to_prepare: Wash a fresh cold cucumber well then cut it into thin slices.
how_to_use: Gently put two cucumber slices on both eyes and leave them on  until they warm up, then turn them over and leave them on until they warm up. Remove the slices and wash your face.

recipes.recipe_name: The Black or Green Tea Recipe
ingredients: 2 cold black tea or green tea bags
how_to_prepare: Add boiling water to the tea bags in a cup
Brew the tea bags for 5 – 10 minutes
Take out the tea bags and put them in the refrigerator to cool
how_to_use: Gently place the tea bags over both eyes. Let them rest for 10-15 minutes then remove the tea bags and rinse the area with water. Repeat regularly.

causes: Aging leading to muscle weakening and tissue deterioration around eyes
Fat movement to the lower eyelids

description: An inflammatory condition from oil and dead skin cells in hair follicles causing bacteria growth.

how_to_prepare: Brew the green teabag in boiling water
Remove the teabag and let it cool
Add the honey to a bowl
Open teabag and empty it in the bowl
Mix well
how_to_use: Wash face well and dry it
Apply the paste on face using clean fingertips
Leave the mask for 15 minutes
Rinse with warm water and pat the face dry
Can be used once a week

recipes.name: The Honey Recipe
how_to_prepare: In bowl add the honey
Add the yogurt
Stir ingredients well with a fork
how_to_use: Tie the hair first to avoid stickiness.
Dampen the face with warm water
Apply the mask on the face
Leave for 15 minutes
Rinse with warm water first then with cool water
Pat the skin with a clean dry towel
This mask can be applied twice a week

description: Common acne type, develops from sebum and dead skin cells clogging pores.

recipes.name: The Egg White Recipe
how_to_prepare: Crack an egg then separate the egg white from the yolk
Add the egg white to a bowl
Add the honey in the same bowl
Mix well
how_to_use: Wash face first then dry it
Apply the mask on affected area
Place a tissue paper on the area of the mask
Leave for 20 minutes
Gently pull the tissue
Rinse with warm water
Can be applied every alternate day for best results

recipes.name: The Tea Tree Oil Recipe
how_to_prepare: In a bowl add the tea tree oil with the carrier oil and mix both well
Add the honey and the sugar to the bowl
Mix well
how_to_use: Steam the face for 10 minutes by boiling water in a bowl then bending over it with a towel covering the head.
Apply the mixture to the nose
Massage gently in a circular motion for 5 minutes
Rinse off with cool water

description: Small, flesh-colored papules on the skin, often found on oily areas of the face.
causes: Clogged pores due to oil and dead skin
Use of certain cosmetics or oils

recipes.name: The Potato Recipe
how_to_prepare: Peel the potato and blend it in a blender or grate it
Extract its juice
Add the juice in a bowl
Add the honey in the bowl
Mix well
how_to_use: Wash the face well
Apply the mask on the face
Leave for 15 minutes
Wash with warm water

recipes.name: The Yogurt Recipe
how_to_prepare: Blend a tomato in a blender to form paste
Add the paste to a bowl
Add the yogurt to the bowl
Mix well
how_to_use: On damp skin, apply the mask on the face
Leave for 20 minutes
Gently rub it off with cool water
This mask can be used twice a week

description: Hair loss is a common condition characterized by Progressive thinning of hair which occurs as people age. Some people experience circular bald patches on their beard eyebrows or scalp.
useful_tips: Protect hair from long exposure to sunlight

how_to_prepare: Blend 2 onion and 5 garlic cloves together.
Strain the mixture to obtain the juice.
how_to_use: Apply the juice and message the scalp.
Leave it on the scalp for at least 10 minutes.
Rinse it off with gentle shampoo.

how_to_prepare: Mix all ingredients to get homogenous paste.
how_to_use: Apply the paste on the bald patches at night.
Let it to stay on the scalp overnight.
Wash hair with shampoo in the morning.

description: Dandruff is a chronic condition characterized by an excessive shedding of dead skin cells from the scalp.
useful_tips: Avoid using hot water to wash the hair
Eat diet rich in omega-3-fatty acids
Use antifungal shampoo day after day

how_to_prepare: Mix all ingredients together to get a mixture.
how_to_use: Apply the mixture to the scalp.
Message the scalp for 3 minutes.
Leave the mixture on the scalp one hour.
Wash hair with gentle shampoo and warm water.

how_to_prepare: Mix fenugreek, hibiscus and milk together to form homogenous mixture.
how_to_use: Apply the mixture to hair and scalp.
Leave it on scalp for almost one hour.
Rinse it off with shampoo.

description: Split ends are caused by damage to the protein structure of the hair, leading to loss of mechanical strength from the cuticle to the cortex.
useful_tips: Avoid washing hair on daily basis
Avoid using heat on the ends of the hair
Use shampoo only on the scalp

how_to_prepare: Mashing bananas using a fork.
Add the mashed banana to the egg.
Mix two ingredients well to form consistent mixture.
how_to_use: Apply the mixture to the hair.
Leave it on the hair at least 15-30 minutes.
Rinse it off using gentle shampoo and warm water.

how_to_prepare: Separate yolk of the egg.
Beat the yolk then, add sunflower oil and mix well.
how_to_use: Apply the mixture to the hair and leave it at least 30 minutes.
Washing hair with shampoo.

causes: Frequent exposure to water and chemicals
Long-term use of nail polish or acrylic nails
description: A condition where nails become easily breakable due to various factors.Almost everyone can have brittle nails. It is a frequent problem that results in split, thin, or weak nails. It may arise from an underlying condition like anemia or thyroid problems or from problems with moisture.
useful_tips: Avoid nail polish removers with acetone
Wear gloves during cleaning and gardening

how_to_prepare: Mix aloe vera gel and the olive oil in a clean bowl very well to form a serum.
Chop the garlic clove in a chopping machine to form a paste.
how_to_use: Rub the garlic paste to the nails, massage it in gentle circular motions and leave it for 10 minutes.
Wash off and dry the nails.
Now Apply the Serum onto the nails and massage it.
Leave it for 2 hours or overnight for better results.
Apply the Serum every night before bed and apply the garlic paste twice a week.

how_to_prepare: In a bowl, mix all the ingredients together very well.
how_to_use: Soak the nails in the bowl.
Leave it for 15 minutes.
Wash the nails very well.
Make sure to dry the nails to avoid making them brittle because of the moisture.
Repeat it as needed.

causes: Frequent exposure to water and chemicals
Long-term use of nail polish or acrylic nails
description: Some people suffer from yellow nails that may appear as a result of unclean nails or nail polish remaining. Yellow nails may also arise from using certain medications or from some diseases such as fungal infection in the nails.
useful_tips: Keep the nails clean and dry.
See the doctor if the condition worsens or stay for a long time.

how_to_prepare: In a bowl, add the water.
Then add the rest of the ingredients and mix them all very well.
how_to_use: Soak the nails in the bowl.
Massage the nails while being soaked.
Leave it for 5 minutes..
Dry the nails very well.
Repeat it twice a week.

ingredients: 3-4 drops of the tea tree oil
how_to_prepare: Put the tea tree oil on the cotton ball.
how_to_use: Massage the nails and nail bed with the cotton ball.
After 2 minutes, wash it with warm water.
Dry the nails.
Massage the nails with the olive oil.

description: Discoloration or darkening of lips due to various external or internal factors.
useful_tips: Use lip balms with SPF 30 or above
Do not use low-quality lip cosmetics.

how_to_prepare: In a clean bowl add all the ingredients and mix them together very well to form the scrub.
how_to_use: Exfoliate the lips with the scrub gently for 2 minutes in a circular motion.
Remove the scrub with damp tissue or towel.
Apply lip balm.
Repeat 2-3 times a week.

causes: Allergic reaction to lip care products
description: Dry, cracked lips caused by various factors like weather or dehydration.
useful_tips: Apply lip balm throughout the day and before going to bed.

how_to_prepare: Mix the vitamin E and the honey in clean bowl very well to form a homogenous mixture.
how_to_use: Apply the mixture to the lips then add a layer of shea butter on it.
Leave it for 15 minutes or overnight for better results.
Remove it with a damp tissue or towel.
Repeat it once a day.

causes: Consumption of certain foods and beverages (like coffee, tea, red wine)
description:
Teeth discoloration is the change of the color of teeth, it often becomes yellow. This discoloration may be extrinsic or intrinsic. 
 Extrinsic Teeth Discoloration: it occurs on the surface of the tooth because of non-metallic factors like tobacco use or poor oral hygiene and metallic factors like using the iron supplements. 
 Intrinsic Teeth Discoloration: this occurs deeply in the teeth because of using some medications like tetracycline antibiotics or because of dental trauma and enamel crack.
useful_tips: Limit the coffee and tea intake.
Never underestimate the efficacy of the teeth flossing.

how_to_prepare: Mash the strawberries to get the strawberries pulp.
Add the pulp, lemon juice and water in a bowl.
Mix them very well to get a paste.
how_to_use: Put some paste on toothbrush.
Apply it on the teeth for 3 minutes.
Rinse it with water.
Brush the teeth with the regular toothpaste.
Repeat it once a week

how_to_prepare: Rub the banana peel with a spoon and get the inner content of it then add it in a clean bowl.
Add the lemon juice and toothpaste to the bowl.
Mix all the ingredients very well to form a homogenous mixture.
how_to_use: Put a little bit of this mixture on a toothbrush.
Brush the teeth for 1 or 2 minutes.
Repeat 3-4 times a week for better results.

causes: Consumption of certain foods and beverages (like coffee, tea, red wine)
description: Halitosis or the bad breath refers to the unpleasant odour that comes from the oral cavity. The reason for the bad breath is the oral bacteria which is normally found between tongue buds that produce sulphur containing compounds. The poor oral hygiene and ignoring the teeth flossing make the bacteria grow on the food left between the teeth and in the mouth causing the bad breath.

how_to_prepare: Boil the water then add the cinnamon and cloves.
Remove from the heat and let them infuse for 10 minutes.
Strain the mixture.
Pour the mixture into a bottle with a lid.
how_to_use: Use it as a mouthwash and gargle with it whenever needed.
Keep it in the refrigerator and use it within 1 week.

how_to_prepare: Mix all the ingredients.
how_to_use: Use it as refreshing mouthwash whenever needed.
